装备被动技能: #ODevourer#n: Generate a shield that can absorb 240#c9e45fa(+120%Attack) #n  magic damage. The shield will refresh if no magic damage is taken for 20 seconds. When the shield breaks, Movement Speed is increased by30% for 3 seconds but will gradually slow down during this period.
